languages.text: This amulet reduces all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} suffered by its wearer by −50%. If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary, they also heal {uip|Wounds|cd2014fc37a44fe58e20a68f7f3ee4e2} wounds each time they suffer toxic {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Амулет снижает получаемый владельцем {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичный урон{/g} на 50%.
Если носитель обладает убеждением {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — поборник, он также исцеляет {uip|Wounds|cd2014fc37a44fe58e20a68f7f3ee4e2} здоровья всякий раз при получении токсичного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This amulet grants its wearer 50% resist to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Toxic Damage{/g}. If the wearer has Conviction: Hereticus — Votary, they also heal <u>1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wound{/g} per Conviction rank</u> each time they suffer Toxic Damage.

This amulet grants its wearer +50% resistance to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. If the wearer has Hereticus — Votary, they also heal <u>(1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} per Hereticus rank)</u> each time they suffer toxic damage.

languages.text: 装备者承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}降低50%。如果装备者拥有信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——信奉者，则每次承受毒素{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时都会恢复{uip|Wounds|cd2014fc37a44fe58e20a68f7f3ee4e2}点生命值。

traits.locale_text: 装备者承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}降低50%。如果装备者拥有信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——信奉者，则每次承受毒素{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时都会恢复{uip|Wounds|cd2014fc37a44fe58e20a68f7f3ee4e2}点生命值。

装备者承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}降低50%。如果装备者拥有信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——信奉者，则每次承受毒素{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时都会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，{uip|Wounds|cd2014fc37a44fe58e20a68f7f3ee4e2}。

languages.text: このアミュレットは、着用者の{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒性ダメージ{/g}を−50％減少する。着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 信奉者を持っている場合、毒性{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたびに傷を{uip|Wounds|cd2014fc37a44fe58e20a68f7f3ee4e2}回復する。

languages.text: Este amuleto reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g} que sufre su portador un −50 %. Si el portador tiene {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Devoto, además recupera {uip|Wounds|cd2014fc37a44fe58e20a68f7f3ee4e2} heridas cada vez que sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} tóxico.

languages.text: Dieses Amulett reduziert den gesamten vom Träger erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} um −50 %. Hat der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} — Geweihter, heilt er {uip|Wounds|cd2014fc37a44fe58e20a68f7f3ee4e2} Wunden, wenn er Gift{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}schaden{/g} erleidet.

traits.locale_text: Dieses Amulett reduziert den gesamten vom Träger erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} um -50 %. Hat der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Geweihter, heilt er {uip|Wounds|cd2014fc37a44fe58e20a68f7f3ee4e2} Wunden, wenn er Gift{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}schaden{/g} erleidet.

Dieses Amulett reduziert sämtlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g}, den der Träger erleidet, um −50 %. Falls der Träger über {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Geweihter verfügt, heilt er außerdem jedes Mal, wenn er {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Giftschaden{/g} erleidet, {uip|Wounds|cd2014fc37a44fe58e20a68f7f3ee4e2}.

languages.text: Cette amulette réduit tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} subis par l'utilisateur de −50 %. Si l'utilisateur possède {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Disciple, il se soigne également à hauteur de {uip|Wounds|cd2014fc37a44fe58e20a68f7f3ee4e2} blessures chaque fois qu'il subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} toxiques.

languages.text: Bu uğurluk, takan kişinin maruz kaldığı tüm {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toksik hasarları{/g} %50 azaltır. Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Coşkulu kanaatine sahipse ayrıca her toksik {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} aldığında {uip|Wounds|cd2014fc37a44fe58e20a68f7f3ee4e2} sağlık puanı tazelenir.
